description: This file contains security utility functions for password hashing, verification, and JWT token creation/decoding for the BackendAPI service.

methods.name: hash_password
methods.description: Hashes a plaintext password using bcrypt.

methods.name: verify_password
methods.description: Verifies a plaintext password against a bcrypt hash.

methods.name: create_access_token
methods.description: Creates a signed JWT access token with optional expiration and extra claims.

methods.name: decode_token
methods.description: Decodes and validates a JWT token, returning the payload claims.
